mapper.select: SELECT tenant_code, #{orderCreatedDay} AS order_created_day, order_act.shop_group_code, order_act.shop_code, order_topping_act.topping_code, COUNT(1) AS amount FROM order_act_record AS order_act LEFT JOIN order_topping_act_record AS order_topping_act ON 1 = 1 AND order_act.tenant_code = #{tenantCode} AND DATE(order_act.order_gmt_created) = #{orderCreatedDay} AND TIME(order_act.order_gmt_created) >= '00:00:00' AND TIME(order_act.order_gmt_created) < '24:00:00' AND order_act.idempotent_mark = order_topping_act.idempotent_mark GROUP BY order_act.tenant_code, #{orderCreatedDay}, order_act.shop_group_code, order_act.shop_code, order_topping_act.topping_code
